data.title: Gaming content
data.desc: I have a YouTube channel called MrAlexbross where I upload videos about videogames, especially gameplays. Also, I have a Twitch channel where I sometimes do streams. I publish updates about new videos on my Facebook and Twitter pages. Besides, I've done videogame content like Minecraft maps and Geometry Dash, 64.0, and Super Mario Maker 2 levels.

image.title: Ralex playing Minecraft
image.alt: A screenshot of Ralex in a Minecraft World

data.title: Personal
data.desc: I usually share on Twitter other types of information that are not necessarily related to my YouTube channel, such as my programming projects or something about me. I also have a Bandcamp account where I show off the music I'm listening to, and I also have a Steam account where you can see the latest stuff I've been playing.

image.title: Ralex coding, drawing, and editing stuff
image.alt: Three screenshots. 1: coding something, 2: drawing an avatar, 3: editing and image

data.title: Coding projects
data.desc: As part of my growth as a programmer, I also have a Github account where I upload programming projects that I've done on my own and with friends. I maintain important projects like Completed-Games Registers (Java) and Bumper KartZ VS (C++ OpenGL).

image.title: Completed-Games Registers project
image.alt: An screenshot showing my program called 'Completed-Games Registers'
